properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love You, Lord Oh Your mercy never fails me All my days, I’ve been held in Your hands From the moment that I wake up Until I lay my head Oh, I will sing of the goodness of God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cause all my life You have been faithful And all my life You have been so, so good With every breath that I am able Oh, I will sing of the goodness of God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love Your voice, You have led me through the fire And in darkest night, You are close like no other I’ve known You as a Father, I’ve known You as a Friend And I have lived in the goodness of God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cause all my life You have been faithful And all my life You have been so, so good With every breath that I am able Oh, I will sing of the goodness of God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your goodness is running after, it’s running after me Your goodness is running after, it’s running after me With my life laid down, I’m surrendered now I give You everything Your goodness is running after, it’s running after me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cause all my life You have been faithful And all my life You have been so, so good With every breath that I am able Oh, I will sing of the goodness of God Oh, I will sing of the goodness of God{/lang-eng}
